name: Wikimedia Search
description: Performs full-text search across entire Wikimedia page content. Returns titles, excerpts, and URLs
author: Shinkai

project.description: Target Wikimedia project (wikipedia, wiktionary, etc). Default: wikipedia

language.description: Two-letter ISO language code (en, es, fr, etc). Must be supported by project. Default: en

query.description: Text to search for in page content. Supports full-text matching and basic search operators

limit.description: Maximum number of results to return. Range: 1-50. Default: 10

description.description: Brief summary of the page content

excerpt.description: Relevant text excerpt containing the search match

url.description: Full URL to view the page in a web browser
